Package ClientTransactions

Class ClientAcct

java.lang.Object
ClientTransactions.ClientAcct
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompanyAcct, IndividualAcct
public abstract class ClientAcct
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstract class to represent each account with each username, password, balance, unique ID, transaction list, and friend list for each account
See Also:
Serialized Form
